 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָחַשׁ‎</span> **verb** ==keep moving, stir== (Late Hebrew ***stir, move***, especially of lips in speech, also, in explanation of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מרחשׁת‎</span>, of ***stewing, boiling***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רְחֵישׁ‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***creep, move, flutter***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***reptile***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לִבִּי דָּבָר טוֺב‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span> [[Ps.45.2|Ps 45:2]] ***is astir.***
